name: Mana Leech
duration: Prolonged (this spell uses the advanced prolongation factors)
effect: The mage curses an item so that it drains its Awakened owner of Mana. Whenever a mage wearing or carrying the item casts a spell with a Mana cost, that cost increases by one. This item requires 20 successes to create.

rotes.roteDescription: Guardians of the Veil punish overly flamboyant magicians with gifts that make their magic harder to work.
